bezulu.title: Be Zulu! Podcast
bezulu.subTitle: Web audio player for podcast
bezulu.description:
Because sometimes you need to reach your audience in a single click on a smartphone...
<small class="block opacity-50">Configure your podcast (url, title, etc.), gather your audio files and publish/update your RSS feed and a web app at once! </small>
bezulu.about:
*Be Zulu!* is a crew of swiss electronic music DJ's.
They publish they mixes on iTunes via their *Be Zulu! Podcast* since 2006.
